definitions: a decorative piece of material showing at the neckline of a woman's dress or blouse, especially one intended to seem part of another garment worn underneath

examples.text: an old-fashioned dress with an elaborate lace vestee

shortDefinitions: decorative piece of material showing at neckline of woman's dress

definitions: a piece of clothing, designed to be worn under a jacket, that simulates the front of a waistcoat or similar garment.
shortDefinitions: piece of clothing that simulates front of waistcoat etc.
